column4: hello, is there any easy GUI way to add folders that are shared by SMB in another computer.?
that only seems to allow me to share my directories.. i want to add a already shared directory
Wait, that was to share them, to access is in places.
Places > Network Servers / Connect to Server
Excellent thanks.. that is one places that I overlooked.
I want to dual boot with windows.. but I need a bootable disk so that i can overwrite the MBR after installing windows
Do you have a Live CD?
That seems to be the easiest way, since those are already a bootable disk for you.
right, but how do I load my already install Linux after botting with the CD?
Well, I'm not familiar with lilo, but !grub has some information for that, which you might be able to tweak for your situation.
Basically you can just mount and chroot, then write whatever you need to to the mbr.
np.  (I've had to do it too.)
